muchina kudzidza: Algorithms inogonesa makomputa kudzidza kubva kune data
kudzidza kwakadzama: Inoshandisa multi-layered neural network pamabasa akaomarara
nlp: Inogonesa makomputa kunzwisisa nekugadzirisa mutauro wevanhu
kuona komputa: Inobvumira makomputa 'kuona' uye kududzira ruzivo rwekuona
kusimbisa kudzidza: Kudzidza kuburikidza nekuedza-uye-kukanganisa nemibairo uye zvirango
kutariswa kudzidza: Kudzidza kubva kune data rakanyorwa rine mapeiri ekupinda-zvekubuda
kudzidza kusingatarisirwi: Kutsvaga mapatani mune data pasina pre-yakatsanangurwa mavara
data mining: Kutsvaga mapatani mukati mehombe uye yakaoma dataset
nyanzvi system: Inoteedzera kugona kuita sarudzo kwenyanzvi yemunhu
tsvaga algorithm: Methodically anoongorora dambudziko nzvimbo kuwana mhinduro
kumiririra ruzivo: Kuti ruzivo rwakarongwa uye kuchengetwa sei kune AI masisitimu
marobhoti: Munda unobata nekugadzira, kuvaka, uye kushandiswa kwemarobhoti
agi: Hypothetical AI ine hungwaru hwemunhu pamabasa mazhinji
genetic algorithm: Tekinoroji yekutsvaga inofemerwa nemaitiro ekushanduka kwechisikigo
chisarudzo muti: Muti-wakaita modhi yekuisa data kubva pane maficha
tsigira vector muchina: Algorithm yekutsvaga mutsara kana hyperplane inoparadzanisa data zvakanyanya
bayesian network: Probabilistic modhi inomiririra hukama pakati pezvakasiyana
fuzzy logic: Inobata nekufunga kuri kufungidzira pane kujeka
chizvarwa chemutauro wechisikigo: Kugadzira zvinyorwa zvakaita sevanhu kubva kune data yakarongwa
manzwiro kuongorora: Kusarudza inzwi remanzwiro kana chinangwa kuseri kwechidimbu chechinyorwa
kuzivikanwa kwemufananidzo: Kuziva zvinhu kana maficha mukati memifananidzo
motokari inozvimiririra: Mota dzinokwanisa kuona zvakatipoteredza uye kufamba pasina kupinza vanhu
shanduro yemuchina: Shanduro yemutauro kubva kune mumwe mutauro kuenda kune mumwe
recommender system: Inofanotaura zvinofarirwa nemushandisi kupa pfungwa yezvinhu kana zvirimo
muenzaniso wemuvengi: Input yakagadzirirwa kunyengedza modhi yekudzidza yemuchina
kutamisa kudzidza: Kushandisazve ruzivo kubva kune rimwe basa kuvandudza kudzidza pane rimwe
generative model: AI modhi inokwanisa kugadzira data nyowani yakafanana neyayo yekudzidziswa seti
yokufananidzira AI: AI yakavakirwa pakushandisa zviratidzo nemitemo (siyana neneural network)
multi-agent system: Kuunganidzwa kweAI vamiririri vanobatana munzvimbo yakagovaniswa
probabilistic programming: Kushandisa mitauro yekuronga kutsanangura mamodheru angangoitika
neuromorphic computing: Hardware yakagadzirirwa kutevedzera mashandiro eiyo biological neurons
